em.title: Embryo ping-pong
em.description: Super-simple Pong implementation in pure embryo.

em.title: embryo custom state
em.description: This example show how to create a custom state from embryo. Clicking on the 3 labels will rotate the object in the given direction.

em.title: embryo run program
em.description: This example show how to run an edje program from embryo code.

em.description: This example show how to change the state of a part from embryo code.

em.title: embryo set text
em.description: This example show how to set the text in TEXT part from embryo code.

em.title: embryo timer
em.description: This example show the usage of timers in embryo.

em.title: toggle using filter
em.description: This example show how to toggle the state of a part using the 'filter' param in edje programs
